name: Gizmek Mikoto, the Cut-throat Cyclone Canine
text: If you have 6 or more banished cards, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. You can only use each of the following effects of "Gizmek Mikoto, the Cut-throat Cyclone Canine" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 monster; add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand whose ATK equals its own DEF, except "Gizmek Mikoto, the Cut-throat Cyclone Canine". If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can shuffle 6 of your banished cards into the Deck.
